formDescriptionTrialComponents: Select the components that should be part of the trial.
formDescriptionTrialComponentsComparator: Decide whether the mix should include ANY or ALL of the selected components.
formLabelMeasures: Please select the measures to plot
modalTextTrialDetails: Below are more details about the trial itself and the components within the trial.
pageHomeWelcome: Welcome to Pick-a-Mix - the home of intercrop data from farm trials across Scotland.
pageHomeWelcomeSubtitle: Interested in growing mixtures but not sure what to expect? The 'Pick-a-Mix' tool will show you crop yields and agronomy from intercrop trials at commercial and research farms across Scotland. Watch the introduction tour for a short guide on using Pick-a-Mix.
pageHomeSubmissionForm: Do you have trial data? If you would like to compare your own trial with the ones in this database, please enter the data using this simple online form: Google Forms.
pageHomeContact: We hope you find this resource useful. If you have any questions, please contact Ali Karley.
tourHomeWelcomeText: Welcome to Pick-a-Mix where we show you crop yields and other data from intercrop trials on commercial and research farms across Scotland.
tourHomeDataTableText: This table shows all trials that are part of this dataset. The columns show trial characteristics and can be sorted. Click on a table row to see more details about the trial. Use the section above the table to filter for components.
tourHomeDataMapText: This map shows the trials in a geographic context by placing them on a map. You can zoom and pan around the map. Use the buttons above the map to switch between trial characteristics. These will then be shown on the map in the form of coloured circles.
tourHomeDataPlotText: Use the selection box below to select trial characteristics. Pressing the button below will plot the data for all trials across the selection.
